original_title: Two Fast - The Journey of Triathlon Legends
overview: Follow the journey of two legendary triathletes, Natascha Badmann and Daniela Ryf, as they prepare to race in the IronMan World Championships. The goal of winning the most prestigious triathlon in the world is an unwavering obsession for them both.
tagline: Follow the journey of two legendary triathletes, Natascha Badmann and Daniela Ryf
title: Two Fast - The Journey of Triathlon Legends
